}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== "7016A0310000 NUB-862(EXT)-1.00 LFP" (and a date code that appears to be '''0708''' [Feb. 2007]) is silkscreened on the board of a production model unit. It is using AR5523A-00.
===Additional specifications, per EnGenius' datasheet=== {{802dot11 RxSens|11a |info= |6M=-90 |54M=-73 }} :<small>note: check the datasheet for more detail - actual numbers will vary depending on the particular band</small> {{802dot11 RxSens|11b |info= |1M=-96 |11M=-91 }} {{802dot11 RxSens|11g |info= |6M=-91 |54M=-75 }}
